props.name: breadcrumbs
props.value: [{ title: t({ id: "id_mesh_manager", message: "Mesh Manager" }), link: "/mc/meshes", current: true }]

props.name: actions
props.value:
hasWriteAccess
							? [
									<SolaceButton key="create_event_mesh" variant="text" onClick={handleCreateMesh}>
										<Trans id="id_create_event_mesh">Create Event Mesh</Trans>
									</SolaceButton>
							  ]
							: undefined

props.name: breadcrumbs
actionMenu
actions
tabs
props.value:
<SolaceTabs
						activeTabValue={tab}
						tabs={[
							{ label: t({ id: "id_status", message: "Status" }), value: "status" },
							{ label: t({ id: "id_connect", message: "Connect" }), value: "connect", disabled: areTabsDisabled },
							{ label: t({ id: "id_manage", message: "Manage" }), value: "manage", disabled: areTabsDisabled },
							{ label: t({ id: "id_monitoring", message: "Monitoring" }), value: "monitoring", disabled: areTabsDisabled },
							{ label: t({ id: "id_configuration", message: "Configuration" }), value: "configuration", disabled: isInProgress },
							{ label: t({ id: "id_tryme", message: "Try Me!" }), value: "tryme", disabled: areTabsDisabled }
						]}
						onTabClick={(value) => {
							if (value === "manage") {
								if (missionControl?.manageUI) {
									history.push(routeSetParams(ROUTER_SERVICES_DETAILS_MANAGE, { serviceId, category: "security" }));
								} else {
									history.push(routeSetParams(ROUTER_SERVICES_DETAILS_MANAGE_LEGACY, { serviceId }));
								}
							} else {
								history.push(routeSetParams(ROUTER_SERVICES_DETAILS, { serviceId: service?.id as string, tab: value }));
							}
						}}
					></SolaceTabs>

props.name: environment
breadcrumbs
props.value: [{ title: t({ id: "id_cluster_manager", message: "Cluster Manager" }), link: ROUTER_SERVICES, current: true }]

props.name: actions
props.value:
hasWriteAccess
							? [
									<SolaceButton key="create_service" variant="text" dataQa="solace-header-action" onClick={handleCreateService}>
										<Trans id="id_create_service">Create Service</Trans>
									</SolaceButton>
							  ]
							: undefined

props.name: breadcrumbs
breadcrumbs
